# Making Fancy Graphics

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='hide',message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggstatsplot)

```

### Create an Image/Graphic

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='hide', warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
jpeg(filename="Figures/myplot1.jpg")
ggplot(data = penguins, 
                       aes(x = flipper_length_mm,
                           y = body_mass_g)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = island, 
                 shape = species),
             size = 3,
             alpha = 0.8) +
  #theme_minimal() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("darkorange","purple","cyan4")) +
  labs(title = "Penguin size, Palmer Station LTER",
       subtitle = "Flipper length and body mass for each island",
       x = "Flipper length (mm)",
       y = "Body mass (g)",
       color = "Penguin island",
       shape = "Penguin species") +
  theme_minimal() 
dev.off()
```

### Create 3 more

Plot 2

```{r, echo=TRUE}
jpeg(filename="Figures/myplot2.jpg")
ggplot(data = penguins, 
                       aes(x = bill_length_mm,
                           y = body_mass_g)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = island, 
                 shape = species),
             size = 3,
             alpha = 0.8) +
  #theme_minimal() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("darkorange","purple","cyan4")) +
  labs(title = "Penguin size, Palmer Station LTER",
       subtitle = "Bill length and body mass for each island",
       x = "Bill length (mm)",
       y = "Body mass (g)",
       color = "Penguin island",
       shape = "Penguin species") +
  theme_minimal() 
dev.off()
```

Plot 3

```{r, echo=FALSE}
jpeg(filename="Figures/myplot3.jpg")
ggbetweenstats(
  data = penguins,
  x = species,
  y = bill_length_mm
)
dev.off()
```

Plot 4

```{r}
jpeg(filename="Figures/myplot4.jpg")
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(fill = species)) +
  labs(x = "Flipper length (mm)",
       y = "Frequency",
       title = "Penguin flipper lengths")
dev.off()
```
